name: Looty
overview: Way back in 1984 Firebird released the Pirate style Arcade Puzzle game 'Booty' for the Amstrad CPC, C64, Commodore Plus/4, and ZX Spectrum. In that game you played as a cabin boy that had to steal treasure from his pirate masters, which meant avoiding other pirates, parrots and booby trapped treasure. If you remembered this rather classic pirate themed game, will be pleased to know that as of today you can download the latest version of 'Looty'; An Amiga game as an inspiration to that classic game of Booty.
